name: I Wipe All The Bandit and Become Warlord
name_original: I Wipe All The Bandit and Become Warlord
description:
This game is about to slain all the enemy on the field. The player have companions to help player in killing the enemy. This game held in colossal Battle.

Programmer & Design: Daniel Kevin Jhon Feko Wahyudi
